approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task Functionality
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The user must be able to input a text description for the task.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user. The list should include the task descriptions.

requirements.title: Task List Performance
requirements.description: The task list should load and render quickly, even with a moderate number of tasks (e.g., up to 100 tasks).

requirements.title: Task List Performance

Ensure optimal system performance and responsiveness

extracted_requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The user must be able to input a text description for the task.

extracted_requirements.title: View Task List
extracted_requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user. The list should include the task descriptions.

original_functional_requirements.title: Create Task Functionality
original_functional_requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task. The user must be able to input a text description for the task.
acceptance_criteria: A text input field is provided for the task description.
A button or action is available to trigger task creation.
Upon successful creation, the task is saved and the user is notified (e.g., a success message).
The text description can be any valid string of characters.

original_functional_requirements.title: View Task List
original_functional_requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user. The list should include the task descriptions.
acceptance_criteria: The task list is displayed on a dedicated screen or within a designated area.
Each task description is clearly visible in the list.
The list dynamically updates to reflect changes in the task data (creation, deletion, modification).
The list displays all tasks, regardless of their creation time.

original_non_functional_requirements.title: Task List Performance
original_non_functional_requirements.description: The task list should load and render quickly, even with a moderate number of tasks (e.g., up to 100 tasks).
acceptance_criteria: The task list loads within 2 seconds.
Scrolling through the task list is smooth and responsive.
